description.@en: Between the lines of awake and asleep, in the haze that is wakeful slumber. After the darkness spreads, but before the sandman arrives, I hear your name leave my lips.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you immediately render one foe Helpless as they are knocked Prone. Your foe can successfully Resist with an Awareness Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe cannot Resist this Magick.

criticalFailure.@en: You cannot seem to rest, despite what you do. You suffer from Sleep Deprivation for 24 hours.

reagents.@en: A handful of sand poured onto the ground (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
